title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: The issue occurs when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed. Instead of returning an HTTP error 404, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps and accessing a URL, the server responds with an HTTP code 200 OK but no content, rather than returning an HTTP error 404 as expected.
EB: When there are no webapps deployed, accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance should result in the server returning an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR: The server should be properly configured to return the appropriate HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
